survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with In-Office Childcare Facilities Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction with the provided in-office childcare facilities, including quality, accessibility, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you utilize the in-office childcare facilities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to assess frequency of usage. Ensure mobile-friendly radio buttons.

script.question_text: How frequently do you utilize the in-office childcare facilities?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the childcare facilities do you find most satisfactory? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify key satisfaction drivers. Ensure checkboxes are clearly labeled.

script.question_text: What aspects of the childcare facilities do you find most satisfactory? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges or concerns you have encountered with the in-office childcare facilities.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges or concerns you have encountered with the in-office childcare facilities.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the in-office childcare facilities to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential. Ensure mobile-friendly radio buttons.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the in-office childcare facilities to a colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the in-office childcare facilities?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather actionable improvement suggestions. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the in-office childcare facilities?
